symptom.name: nausea
symptom.precaution: Eat small, frequent meals. Stay hydrated. Avoid triggers like strong smells.

symptom.name: headache
symptom.precaution: Rest, stay hydrated, and use over-the-counter pain relievers if approved by your doctor.

symptom.name: back pain
symptom.precaution: Practice good posture, use a pregnancy pillow, and consider prenatal massage.

symptom.name: fatigue
symptom.precaution: Get plenty of rest, eat a balanced diet, and try gentle exercise like walking.

symptom.name: swelling
symptom.precaution: Elevate your feet, stay hydrated, and avoid standing for long periods.
